https://carsandbids.com/auctions/9AEEpL0.dougs_take: The F10 BMW M5 is a true do-it-all sports sedan. It touts an excellent balance of attractive styling, great performance, and modern technology, making the F10 a favorite among enthusiasts – myself included. This particular F10 M5 touts some highly desirable factory equipment, including the Competition and Executive packages, Driver Assistance Plus, and a Bang & Olufsen sound system. Its relatively low mileage and minimal modifications further enhance the appeal – AND it boasts a clean, accident-free Carfax report with California-only ownership.
auction_highlights: The odometer displays approximately 38,200 miles.
The attached Carfax vehicle history report lists no accidents or mileage discrepancies in this BMW's past. It also confirms that this M5 has been registered in California since new.

Factory equipment includes Competition, Driver Assistance Plus, and Executive packages, Merino leather upholstery, heated and power-adjustable front seats, a Bang & Olufsen sound system, and a navigation system, among others listed below.
Modifications reported by the seller include black kidney grilles, paint protection film on the front end, black side grilles, and window tint.

BMW launched the fifth-generation M5 globally in 2011. It was based on the F10-generation 5 Series, and it swapped its predecessor's naturally-aspirated V10 for a turbocharged V8, though it offered enthusiasts a generous bump in horsepower and torque. This M5 was also considerably more high-tech than its predecessor, but BMW M engineers went out of their way to ensure the electronics didn't dilute the driving experience.
Power comes from a turbocharged "S63" 4.4-liter V8, rated at 575 horsepower and 500 lb-ft of torque. Output is sent to the rear wheels via a 7-speed dual-clutch automatic transmission.
auction_equipment: Competition Package (20-inch Style 343M wheels, engine output increased to 575 horsepower, firmer suspension system, and remapped Dynamic Stability Control system)
Driver Assistance Plus (active blind spot detection, active driving assistant, side- and top-view cameras)

Executive Package (power tailgate, soft-close automatic doors, rear sunshades, front ventilated seats, active front seats, heated rear seats, 4-zone climate control, adaptive full LED headlights, automatic high beams, head-up display, concierge services)

https://carsandbids.com/auctions/3gewOqM.auction_subtitle: 1 Owner, 6-Speed Manual, V8 Power, ~45,600 Miles, California-Owned
https://carsandbids.com/auctions/3gewOqM.dougs_take: The B7 Audi RS4 is a special car, as it's the only RS4 Audi ever offered in North America – and the Cabriolet models are exceedingly rare, as Audi brought just 300 of them to our shores. This particular RS4 Cabriolet is especially desirable: it's a one-owner car that touts just 45,600 miles, it's entirely unmodified, and it boasts warm-climate California ownership from new. Plus, this RS4 comes with a clean, accident-free Carfax report – AND it benefits from some recent documented servicing, for added buyer confidence.
auction_highlights: This RS4 is equipped with a 6-speed manual transmission, and its odometer currently displays about 45,600 miles.
The attached Carfax history report lists no accidents or mileage discrepancies in this Audi's past. It also confirms that this is a one-owner car that's been registered in California from new.

Factory equipment includes 19-inch alloy wheels, RS4-specific sport suspension, bi-xenon headlights, a power-retractable soft top, Silk Nappa leather upholstery, carbon fiber interior trim, heated front seats, a Bose premium sound system, and a navigation system. The seller reports no modifications.

Audi sold the "B7" generation RS4 in the United States during the 2007 and 2008 model years. Offered as a sedan and as a convertible, both body styles were exclusively equipped with a 6-speed manual transmission. Audi hasn't made another RS4 available in America since, largely because the next two generations were only made as station wagons.

Power comes from a 4.2-liter V8, rated at 420 horsepower and 317 lb-ft of torque. Output is sent to all four wheels via a 6-speed manual transmission and Audi's Quattro permanent all-wheel drive system.

The F31-generation is the last 3 Series wagon sold in the United States. It was introduced in 2013 and offered through 2019. The model was sold as the 328i, powered by a 2.0-liter 4-cylinder turbo, and the 328d, powered by a turbodiesel 4-cylinder, also displacing 2.0 liters.
Power for this 328d comes from an "N47" 2.0-liter turbodiesel inline-4, rated at 180 horsepower and 280 lb-ft of torque. Output is sent to all four wheels via an 8-speed automatic transmission.

https://carsandbids.com/auctions/35MvLXD.dougs_take: I love the new Ford F-150 Lightning, and it's a great option for those in the market for an electric pickup – touting practical features like 4-wheel drive, a large frunk, a usable driving range, and great technology. This particular Lightning is a Lariat model that includes features like an extended-range battery, a locking rear axle, heated and ventilated front seats, an 8-speaker Bang & Olufsen audio system, Ford Co-Pilot360 Active 2.0 technology, and more. This Lightning also indicates less than 4,000 miles – and it's offered with a clean, accident-free Carfax report, further enhancing the appeal.
auction_highlights: The attached Carfax history report indicates no accidents or mileage discrepancies in this Ford's past.

According to the window sticker provided in the gallery, this Lightning carried a sticker price of $79,269 and came equipped with Equipment Group 511A, an extended-range battery, an electric drive e-lock rear axle, a power-operated hood and tailgate, power-adjustable, heated, and ventilated front seats, a 360-degree camera, an 8-speaker Bang & Olufsen sound system, and more as detailed below. Modifications reported by the seller are limited to a Retrax retractable bed cover and an aftermarket bed rug.

Formerly used on a high-performance gasoline variant of the F-150, the Lightning nameplate was revived for the 2022 model year by Ford's first series-produced electric truck. Every member of the line-up offers dual electric motors for through-the-road all-wheel drive, though buyers have two battery packs to choose from, and driving range varies accordingly.

Power comes from a pair of electric motors (one per axle), which draw electricity from a 131-kilowatt-hour lithium-ion battery pack to turn all four wheels with 580 horsepower and 775 lb-ft of torque. The Lightning earned a maximum driving range of 320 miles from the EPA with the extended-range battery.
auction_equipment: Equipment Group 511A (Lariat Lightning Series, Ford Co-Pilot360 Active 2.0, partitioned lockable storage, Tow Technology Package, onboard scales with smart hitch, twin panel sunroof)

Power-adjustable, heated, and ventilated front seats
modifications: Retrax Pro XR retractable bed cover

https://carsandbids.com/auctions/308bYZg.auction_subtitle: ~51,900 Miles, AWD, California- and Arizona-Owned, Mostly Unmodified
https://carsandbids.com/auctions/308bYZg.dougs_take: The 996-generation Porsche 911 has finally earned a spot at the table of collectible Porsche models – and this example looks like a nice one. It's a desirable 4S Cabriolet that touts reasonably low mileage, dry-climate California and Arizona ownership history, and a classic color combination. It's also nicely equipped with 18-inch Turbo Look II wheels, xenon headlights, a full leather interior, and a Bose sound system. Plus, this Carrera 4S is nearly unmodified – and it comes with a clean, accident-free Carfax report, for added buyer confidence.
auction_highlights: The odometer on this Carrera 4S currently displays about 51,900 miles.
The attached Carfax history report lists no accidents or mileage discrepancies in this 911’s past. It also shows that it's been registered in California and Arizona since new.

A build sheet is provided in the photo gallery, and a partial list of notable equipment includes 18-inch Turbo Look II wheels, a power-retractable soft top, a full leather interior with supple leather seats, aluminum-look interior trim, power-adjustable and heated front seats, a Bose sound system, and more as detailed below. Modifications are limited to clear side marker lights.

Porsche introduced the 996-generation 911 for the 1999 model year. It was the first water-cooled 911, and it stood out from its predecessors with a new-look front end that ditched the round lights. The line-up grew to include coupe, convertible, and Targa models plus numerous variants ranging from the base Carrera to the track-ready GT2.

Released for 2002, the wide-body Carrera 4S variant of the 996 offered enthusiasts all-wheel-drive, plus suspension and brake components borrowed from the Turbo in a naturally-aspirated package. It also bore a distinctive reflector bar across its rear.
Power comes from an "M96" 3.6-liter flat-6, rated at 320 horsepower and 273 lb-ft of torque. Output is sent to all four wheels via a 5-speed automatic transmission.
auction_equipment: Full leather interior with supple leather seats
Power-adjustable and heated front seats with driver's memory function

https://carsandbids.com/auctions/3BZazQA.dougs_take: The Acura RSX Type-S is a cool and sporty car that follows a recipe for fun reminiscent of old-school Acura. Specifically, it's small and lightweight, it boasts a 6-speed manual transmission, and it has a punchy naturally-aspirated 2.0-liter engine. This particular RSX Type-S is nearly unmodified, too – and it comes with a clean, accident-free Carfax report showing ownership history is dry climate states since 2011, both of which are nice benefits. Plus, this RSX is offered with no reserve, so someone is taking it home at the end of the auction.

The attached Carfax history report lists no accidents or mileage discrepancies in this RSX's past.

Factory equipment includes 17-inch wheels, a power sunroof, leather upholstery, power windows, mirrors, and locks, a Bose sound system, automatic climate control, and cruise control. Modifications reported by the seller are limited to tinted windows.

The RSX replaced the Integra for the 2002 model year in the US with similar dimensions but revised styling inside and out, more power from new K-Series 4-cylinder engines, and a strut-type front suspension. The Type-S built upon the base model with a stiffened suspension and a sportier version of the 4-cylinder, plus an exclusive 6-speed manual transmission.
Power comes from a 2.0-liter " K20Z1" inline-4 engine, rated at 201 horsepower and 140 lb-ft of torque. Output is sent to the front wheels via a 6-speed manual transmission.

https://carsandbids.com/auctions/K1YRpg5.auction_subtitle: 5-Speed Manual, Extensive Modifications, Japanese Import with U.S. Title
https://carsandbids.com/auctions/K1YRpg5.dougs_take: The original Subaru Impreza WRX is one of the most iconic sport sedans to come out of Japan – and while Subaru never sold the model in the United States, several examples have trickled in now that they're old enough to legally import. This is one of these cars – it boasts a U.S. title for peace of mind, and it features a long list of aftermarket parts intended to improve its look and its performance, including a desirable GReddy turbocharger, Speedline wheels, and World Rally Blue paint. This WRX is also listed by a great seller – and it sounds great, too, with a fantastic exhaust note in the included video.
auction_highlights: This is a right-hand-drive, Japanese-market sedan that's titled in New Hampshire.

Modifications to this WRX are extensive, and the full list is detailed below. Highlights include a GReddy turbocharger, equal-length headers, 17-inch Speedline wheels, a body kit, a roll cage, Recaro front seats, a Pivot Racing Spec lap timer, a Blitz turbo timer, Alpine parts in the sound system, and a trunk-mounted amplifier, among other aftermarket parts.

Subaru released the first WRX in Japan in 1992. Offered as a sedan and a little later as a hatchback, the WRX (World Rally eXperimental) benefited from the lessons the Japanese firm learned while racing the Legacy in international rally events. Its turn to compete came after the Legacy's retirement, and an overall victory in the 1995 World Rally Championship tremendously boosted sales and Subaru's image around the world. Still, the original WRX was never sold in the United States.

Power comes from a 2.0-liter turbocharged flat-4, rated at about 240 horsepower and 224 lb-ft of torque when left stock. The modifications might increase those figures but a dyno sheet is not available. Part of the long-running "EJ" family of engines, it spins the four wheels via a 5-speed manual transmission and Subaru's permanent all-wheel-drive system.
modifications: Body kit (including front bumper, side skirts, and rear wing)
Emblems removed from the trunk lid
Alpine parts in the sound system

Mercedes-Benz introduced the E-Class Coupe (called C207 internally) for the 2010 model year to replace the second-generation CLK. It was positioned as a sportier alternative to the E-Class, as its name implied, but it shared much of its underpinnings with the W204-generation C-Class. Production ended in 2017.

The A207 E-Class Cabriolet was first shown in 2010 at the North American International Auto Show. It replaced the CLK-Class in the Mercedes-Benz lineup as a four-seater convertible positioned above the A205 C-Class Cabriolet.
Power comes from a 3.0-liter turbocharged V6, rated at 329 horsepower and 354 lb-ft of torque. Output is sent to the rear wheels via a 7-speed automatic transmission.

https://carsandbids.com/auctions/92Q4vXm.dougs_take: The Daihatsu Rocky is fun little SUV with surprising off-road capabilities and robust underpinnings. This particular Rocky is a right-hand drive, Japanese-spec model offered with a U.S. title, which means the difficult task of importing one from abroad has already been completed. It boasts 4-wheel drive, a pair of removable hardtops, cool cloth upholstery, and air conditioning. It also benefits from a few upgrades, including a recent exterior repaint – and it has an indicated 61,600 miles, further adding to the appeal. This looks like a well-kept Rocky – and it’s offered with the thrill of no reserve!
auction_highlights: This Daihatsu is a Japanese-spec, right-hand-drive SUV that's titled in New Hampshire. Reportedly imported from Japan in 2022, it's equipped with a metric instrument cluster, and the odometer currently shows about 99,100 kilometers, which represents approximately 61,600 miles.
Factory equipment includes automatic locking front hubs, a fender-mounted mirror, a rear bumper protector, removable hardtops, Canterbury of New Zealand cloth upholstery, and air conditioning.
Modifications reported by the selling dealer include a green exterior repaint, a Pioneer Carrozzeria head unit, aftermarket rear speakers, and more as detailed below.

Released globally in 1989, and briefly sold in the United States, the F300-generation Rocky was a body-on-frame SUV that offered excellent off-road capacity in a city-friendly package. American sales ended in the early 1990s but the Rocky lived on in Japan until 1997 and in some overseas markets until 2002.

Power comes from a 1.6-liter 4-cylinder engine, rated at approximately 105 horsepower and 103 lb-ft of torque. Output is sent to the rear or the four wheels via a 4-speed automatic transmission and a 2-speed transfer case.

https://carsandbids.com/auctions/rEDW08M.dougs_take: The Polaris Slingshot is a ton of fun to drive, as it's part motorcycle, part roadster and fully exciting. This Slingshot boasts low mileage, and it features a long list of modifications intended to improve the look – like a carbon fiber body kit and an aftermarket shift knob. The aftermarket parts in the sound system are a nice addition, as well – and this example boasts cruise control, along with a small windshield for added practicality. Plus, this Slingshot is powered by a General Motors-sourced engine, so finding parts should be relatively straight-forward.

Some of the removed factory parts are pictured in the gallery and included in the sale.

Pegged at the intersection of motorcycles and cars, the Polaris Slingshot arrived for 2015 with a tubular chassis, polymer body panels, a front-mounted General Motors-sourced engine, and a reverse trike layout. It offers enthusiasts the experience of riding a sports bike and the handling of a sports car; it has no doors and no roof in its standard configuration, but it features a steering wheel and pedals.
Power comes from a 2.4-liter "EcoTec" inline-4, rated at 173 horsepower and 166 lb-ft of torque. Power is sent to the rear wheel through a 5-speed manual transmission.

https://carsandbids.com/auctions/37XQMNq.dougs_take: I love the third-generation Dodge Ram, and the heavy-duty 2500 model is a great truck for towing and hauling – especially when equipped with the 5.9-liter Cummins high-output turbodiesel 6-cylinder, like this one has. The third generation of Dodge Ram debuted in 2001 for the 2002 model year, and the Ram 1500 included an all-new frame, suspension, powertrains, interiors, and sheet metal. The 2500/3500 trucks were introduced in 2003 and retained their durable live rear axles. Four-wheel drive models featured a solid front axle and recirculating-ball steering setup, and the two-wheel drive models came equipped with an independent front suspension and rack-and-pinion steering.

https://carsandbids.com/auctions/3702EMB.dougs_take: Now this is a really cool Land Cruiser! It's a Japanese-market 80-Series that features the desirable combination of diesel power, a 5-speed manual transmission, AND triple locking differentials. This Land Cruiser also features some upgrades intended to make it even more capable off the beaten path, including a suspension lift, 17-inch Method Race wheels, and 34-inch Goodyear mud-terrain tires. Other benefits include low mileage for one of these and a U.S. registration, which means that the next owner won't have to worry about the difficulty of importing it from abroad. To top it off, this Land Cruiser is offered with the excitement of no reserve, which should make for a thrilling auction finish!
auction_highlights: This Land Cruiser is a Japanese-spec, right-hand drive SUV equipped with a 5-speed manual transmission. Reportedly imported from Japan in April 2022, it's equipped with a metric instrument cluster, and the odometer shows about 132,800 kilometers, which represents approximately 82,500 miles.
Factory equipment includes triple locking differentials, running boards, rear ambulance-style doors, cloth upholstery, and automatic climate control.

The full list of modifications reported by the selling dealer is detailed below. Highlights include a Rancho suspension lift kit, 17-inch Method Race wheels with 34-inch Goodyear Territory MT tires, a tubular front bumper, fender-mounted wing mirrors, and an Eclipse touchscreen head unit.

Released globally in 1990, the 80-Series is the first Land Cruiser to firmly plant its flag in the luxury segment. It was bigger than its predecessor, it gained a more aerodynamic design, and it offered better materials inside. It nonetheless kept what adventurers loved about the Land Cruiser: solid axles, a 2-speed transfer case, and a generous amount of ground clearance. Japanese production ended in 1997.

Power comes from a "1HZ" 4.2-liter diesel inline-6, rated at approximately 129 horsepower and 210 lb-ft of torque. Output is sent to all four wheels through a 5-speed manual transmission and a 2-speed transfer case.

https://carsandbids.com/auctions/KVGzO1z.dougs_take: The 981 Porsche Boxster S is a fantastic sports car with thrilling handling, handsome styling, and excellent performance, thanks to a naturally-aspirated 3.4-liter flat-6 mounted in the middle. This particular Boxster S has a lot going for it, including the beautiful color combination of Anthracite Brown Metallic over a Luxor Beige leather interior. It also boasts some nice factory equipment, including the Porsche Active Suspension Management (PASM) system, adaptive cruise control, and a set of 19-inch wheels. Other benefits include just 11,600 miles, and a clean, accident-free Carfax report showing just two owners in dry-climate Southern California from new, further adding to the appeal.

The 981 Boxster was sold from 2013 through 2016 as Porsche's entry-level sports car, though this range-topping S model considerably shrinks the performance gap between itself and the base 911 Carrera. The S model sports a 77-pound weight reduction over the previous generation Boxster, and employs a slightly de-tuned (35 hp less) version of the same engine that powers its larger sibling.
Power comes from a 3.4-liter flat 6, rated at 315 horsepower and 266 lb-ft of torque. Output is sent to the rear wheels via a 7-speed PDK dual-clutch automatic transmission.

Volvo waded into a segment dominated by its German rivals when it released the S60R for 2004. Its engineers used a turbocharged engine, Haldex all-wheel drive, and innovative suspension technology to create what was then the fastest series-produced car ever to wear a Volvo emblem. The S60R stayed true to its Swedish roots with a relatively low-key design.

https://carsandbids.com/auctions/9elDlZv.dougs_take: I love this build! It's an E30-generation BMW 3 Series that started life as a lowly 325e with an automatic transmission – but it's now reportedly powered by a 325is-sourced 2.5-liter straight-6, so it's more powerful than stock, and it boasts a 5-speed manual transmission that enhances the driving experience further. This E30 also features several suspension modifications that should improve handling, including aftermarket shocks and springs – yet it looks nearly unmodified when viewed from the outside. Other benefits include a clean, accident-free Carfax history report for peace of mind, and the excitement of no reserve.
auction_highlights: The attached Carfax history report starts in 2004 and lists no accidents since, though it contains several gaps. It also shows that this BMW has been Georgia-owned since at least 2004.

This 325e's factory-fitted 2.7-liter straight-6 was replaced by a 2.5-liter "M20B25" straight-6 sourced from a 1989 325is, according to the seller. The list of modifications reported by the seller also includes a 5-speed manual transmission and a 4.10:1-ratio limited-slip differential from a 1989 325is, aftermarket headers, an Ireland Engineering Motorsports muffler, a Condor Speed Shop subframe, 14-inch BBS wheels, Bilstein struts, and H&R Special Springs Super Sport springs.

BMW introduced the E30-generation 3 Series in the United States late in the 1983 model year. It was originally offered exclusively with a 4-cylinder engine, but 6-cylinder-powered models were quickly added to the range. The 325e notably joined the line-up for 1984 as the first 6-cylinder-powered E30 sold in the United States, and the 325iX released for 1988 was the first series-produced BMW with permanent all-wheel-drive. BMW made several updates to the E30 and production ended after the 1991 model year.
Power comes from a 2.5-liter straight-6, rated at 166 horsepower and 163 lb-ft of torque. It spins the rear wheels via a 5-speed manual transmission.

https://carsandbids.com/auctions/9e22zdd.auction_subtitle: Left-Hand Drive SUV, 5-Speed Manual, 4WD, U.S. Registration
https://carsandbids.com/auctions/9e22zdd.dougs_take: WOW – our first Lada Niva is here! These are pretty obscure in the United States, but they're hugely popular in other parts of the world because they're cheap to run and extremely capable off the beaten path. In fact, the Niva is so popular that it's still in production over 45 years after its debut. This is a left-hand drive example that touts a U.S. registration for peace of mind. It's also mostly unmodified, which is a great benefit, and it looks like it's been relatively well-kept – a lot of these were heavily modified, driven hard, or both. I'm happy to see this little SUV on Cars & Bids, and I bet this is going to be an exciting auction.
auction_highlights: This is a left-hand drive Niva that was reportedly imported from Japan in 2022. Registered in New Hampshire, it's equipped with a metric instrument cluster and its 5-digit odometer displays about 55,300 kilometers, which represents approximately 34,500 miles.
The attached Carfax history report starts in 2022 and lists no accidents since.

Factory equipment includes 16-inch steel wheels, headlight wipers, mudflaps, manual windows, and rubber flooring. Modifications reported by the selling dealer are limited to aftermarket switches on the dashboard and a Kenwood CD player.

Lada launched the Niva in 1977 as an affordable, capable, and durable off-roader. Initially only offered with two doors, it stood out from many comparable SUVs with unibody construction and a full-time four-wheel drive system. It was later made available with four doors, and several third-party companies turned it into a convertible. Lada has made numerous updates to the Niva over the past couple of decades and the model remains available new today in some markets, including Russia. While it was briefly sold in Canada, it was never officially available in the United States.
Power comes from a 1.6-liter 4-cylinder engine, rated at about 75 horsepower and 87 lb-ft of torque. It spins the four wheels via a 5-speed manual transmission and a 2-speed transfer case.

The Ferrari 348 was built between 1989 and 1995 as the successor to Ferrari's long-running rear-mid-engine line. Major updates over the 328 that preceded it included updated exterior styling, a longitudinally-mounted engine design, and a more powerful "Tipo F119" V8.
Power comes from a 3.4-liter V8 engine, rated at 312 horsepower and 228 lb-ft of torque. Mid-mounted, it spins the rear wheels via a gated 5-speed manual transmission.

https://carsandbids.com/auctions/9W5WdQ7.auction_subtitle: NO RESERVE British-Market Hot Hatch, Some Modifications, U.S. Title
https://carsandbids.com/auctions/9W5WdQ7.dougs_take: Peugeot never sold the 205 in the United States, but the model was extremely popular in Europe – and the GTi variant is often considered one of the best hot hatches of the 1980s, as it's relatively light, quick, AND a lot of fun to drive thanks in part to a mandatory 5-speed manual transmission. This is a 1.6-liter-powered GTi that's titled in the United States, which is a major benefit – and it touts an attractive color combination; check out the striped cloth upholstery and red carpets! This 205 GTi also features some modifications, including 15-inch wheels from a newer model, along with a sunroof. It's not perfect, but that means you can drive it the way Peugeot intended without feeling guilty about it – and it's offered with the excitement of no reserve.
auction_highlights: This is a right-hand drive, British-market 205 that's titled in Montana.
The attached Carfax history report starts in 2013 and lists no accidents since.

Factory equipment includes a GTi-specific body kit, fog lights, cloth upholstery, and front sport seats. Modifications reported by the seller include 15-inch wheels from a 1.9-liter-powered 205 GTi, Bilstein Group N Tarmac dampers and springs, an aftermarket sunroof, and a Pioneer CD player.

Peugeot released the 205 in 1983, and the hatchback quickly became the brand's best-selling model. The range-topping GTi made its debut in 1984 with a 1.6-liter 4-cylinder engine and went through several evolutions; 1986 notably brought a 115-horsepower engine and the 1.9-liter-powered model arrived later that year. The GTi retired in 1993, but 205 production continued until 1998.
Power comes from a 1.6-liter 4-cylinder engine, rated at about 115 horsepower and 99 lb-ft of torque. Part of the "XU" family of engines, it spins the front wheels via a 5-speed manual transmission.

https://carsandbids.com/auctions/3vY1O7x.auction_subtitle: ~50,600 Miles, 1 of 50 in the U.S., Formerly Reviewed by Doug DeMuro
https://carsandbids.com/auctions/3vY1O7x.dougs_take: I love this! The R55 Mini Clubvan is one of the rarest Mini models in North America, as they sold just 50 cars in the few months that went on sale – and it's one of the quirkiest vans ever made. This particular Clubvan is also the very same car I reviewed a few years ago, which adds to my excitement for this weird and special Mini. Like all of these, this one is finished in the handsome Pepper White, and it’s fitted with some nice factory features, including roof rails, a split tailgate, and air conditioning. It also has a relatively low 50,600 miles – and it touts a clean, accident-free Carfax report, showing just two owners in warm-weather California from new, further adding to the appeal. If you always wanted one of the rarest Mini models ever made, this is your chance!
auction_highlights: The odometer in this Mini indicates approximately 50,600 miles.
The attached Carfax history report shows no accidents or mileage discrepancies in this Mini's past. It also confirms that this is a 2-owner car registered in California from new.

According to the build sheet provided in the gallery, factory equipment includes 16-inch alloy wheels, roof rails, a multifunction sport leather steering wheel, climate control, rear Park Distance Control, and more as detailed below. Modifications reported by the seller are limited to a rubber trunk liner.

Released for the US market in 2013, the Mini Clubvan was a compact commercial van based on the R55-generation Mini Clubman. The Clubvan retained the third passenger door, but the rear seats were removed to create a flat load floor complete with tie-down points. The rear windows were covered with vinyl from the outside and plastic inserts on the inside. Mini withdrew the Clubvan from the US market in July 2013 due to low demand and the excessive 25% "Chicken Tax" in place on light commercial vehicles. Only 50 Clubvans were sold in the U.S. during their short production run.
Power comes from a 1.6-liter inline-4, rated at 121 horsepower and 114 lb-ft of torque. Output is sent to the front wheels through a 6-speed automatic transmission.
known_flaws: Rock chips on the front end
Scuffs on the front bumper's underside
Scratches on the rear bumper
Scratch on the roof (pictured in the photo gallery)
services: October 2020: Engine oil and filter changed, brake fluid flushed/changed, four tires mounted, glass repaired

May 2018 (17,721 miles): Brake fluid flushed/changed
